channel.title: Making a new .java file
channel.description:
Alright, so Goth Wolf and myself are working on a small project, and we're trying to determine (I'm a nub coder), is it possible to create a new .java to base off of using Items on Objects or Items on Items or shit, mainly for the skills.
Like say, I want to make a new .java file that is based only for crafting which is using a Gold Bar on a Furnace, Item on Object.
Any idea how I would go about doing this?

item.title: Making a new .java file
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[code] case 192:
int actionButton2 = Misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 0, packetSize);
int j6 = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();
int atObjectID = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian();
int atObjectY = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndianA();
int itemSlot = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndian();
int atObjectX = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndianA();
int useItemID = inStream.readUnsignedWord();

	Items.method(this, atObjectID, useItemID);[/code]

Read full topic
